data.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Where there is love there is life.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The future depends on what we do in the present.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The simplest acts of kindness are by far more powerful than a thousand heads bowing in prayer.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is like an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi
